column1: '''1 Yule''' was the last day in the [[Shire Calendar]]
column2: marking the end of the year.<ref>{{App|Shire}}</ref> On a modern calendar
column3: it would approximately correspond to 21 December.  Due to the [[Shire-reform]] the Yuledays always fell on the same days of the week.  1 Yule was always a [[Highday]] (Friday).<ref>{{App|Calendars}}</ref>
